name: First Baptist Church East Bernstadt
description: Baptist church with mission to 'Make Disciples who love God, and serve others, so that all may know God.' Services include Sunday School at 9:45 AM, worship services at 11:00 AM (in person and online), Celebrate Recovery program on Thursdays at 6:00 PM, and various community support programs. The church offers biblical teaching, authentic worship, and encouraging community for all ages.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Sunday: 9:45 AM Sunday School, 11:00 AM Worship; Thursday: 6:00 PM Celebrate Recovery
notes: Main office phone: (606) 843-6211. Celebrate Recovery program phone: (606) 438-3263. Church offers online worship services and various community programs.
